description: Chipotle paste adds lots of smoky flavour to these lighter turkey enchiladas, bulked up with diced mushrooms for extra hidden veg.
name: Chipotle Turkey Enchiladas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and fry the turkey mince, diced onion, capsicum and mushrooms for 5 minutes. Add the garlic, chipotle paste and cumin and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the beans and chopped tomatoes and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Squeeze in the lime juice and stir.

Lightly grease a large baking dish, place a tortilla in, fill with turkey chilli, roll up and repeat until all the tortillas have been used. Top with grated cheddar, bake for 15 minutes until golden and bubbling and serve.
